fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Starts as a townie. Becomes a Random Coven once one other Coven remains. Cannot spawn as a conversion immune town.
You are aware you are an amnestic wizard when the game begins
The Coven know who you are and cannot perform actions that negatively affect you.
Spawns in a good slot
May only spawn if another member of the Coven is present
May not hold the Necronomicon.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill who would oppose the Coven
